---
title: "Online help and materials"
---

There are lots and lots of materials available online, simply enter your query in google with a single letter: **r** and the chances are that you'll find your answer at the top. In addition we have listed several links below:  

- [The R Project for Statistical Computing](https://www.r-project.org/)
- [The Comprehensive R Archive Network](https://cran.r-project.org/)
- [RStudio](https://rstudio.com/)
- [RStudio Cheat Sheets](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/)
- [R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/)
- [The R Graph Gallery](https://www.r-graph-gallery.com/index.html)
- [R for Data Science ; Garrett Grolemund, Hadley Wickham](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/)
